title: Bolsonaro Is Silent After Brazil Election Defeat
description: President Jair Bolsonaro has not yet recognized his election defeat after months of warning, without evidence, that opponents would rig the vote.
dc:creator: Jack Nicas, Flávia Milhorance and André Spigariol
media:credit: Dado Galdieri for The New York Times
media:description: Supporters of President Jair Bolsonaro watching in Brasília, the capital of Brazil, as the results of the presidential election were announced on Sunday.
